Auto open book in full screen: स्वत् फुल स्क्रीन में किताब चालू करें
Access token expired, refetching token: एक्सेस टोकन समाप्त हो गया, टोकन पुनः प्राप्त करना
Access token received, please continue: एक्सेस टोकन प्राप्त, कृपया जारी रखें
Fetching access token failed: एक्सेस टोकन प्राप्त करना विफल रहा
Authorizing, please wait: अधिकृत कर रहा है, कृपया प्रतीक्षा करें
Author: लेखक
Sort by Date: दिनांक के हिसाब से अलग करे
Please authorize your account, and fill: कृपया अपने अकाउन्ट को अधिकृत करें, और टोकन के साथ निम्नलिखित बॉक्स को भरें
Shelf title can't be pure number: शेल्फ का शीर्षक संख्या में नहीं हो सकता
This process is irreversible, and will c: यह प्रक्रिया अपरिवर्तनीय है, और पूरी तरह से आपकी वर्तमान लाइब्रेरी को ओवरराइट करेगी, यह सुनिश्चित करें कि आप क्या कर रहे हैं
Lemmatize words when looking up in a dic: शब्दकोश में देखते समय शब्दों को छोटा करें
To reduce the different forms of a word: किसी शब्द के विभिन्न रूपों को एक ही रूप में संकुचित करना, उदाहरण के लिए, builds को कम करना, building या built to build, cats को cat में कम करना, fastest को fast में कम करना
Export all dictionary history: पूरे शब्दकोश का इतिहास निर्वात करें
Nothing to export: निर्वात करने के लिए कुछ नहीं
Auto precache books after import: निर्वात के बाद स्वत् पुर्व-कैश़ करें
Pre-cache books after import to increase: किताबें खोलने की स्पीड बढ़ाने का लिए पुर्व-कैश़ करें, Koodo वास्तविक किताब का पुर्व-कैश़ वर्ज़न बनायेगा और आपके लाइब्रेरी में उसे सेव़ करेगा
Don't use first page as PDF cover: PDF कव़र के लिए पहला पन्ने का उपयोग ना करें
You may see this error when the book you: आप यह error देखेगें जब आयात की जाने वाली किताब Koodo Reader सपोर्ट नहीं करेगा, Calibre से इसे कन्वर्ट करने की कोशिश करें
This action will clear and remove this s: यह क्रिया इस शेल्फ़ को साफ़ और हटा देगी
This action will clear and remove this t: यह क्रिया इस टैग़ को साफ़ और हटा देगी
Try refresh or restart: रिफ्रेश या पुनः आरंभ करने का प्रयास करें
Book size is over 20M: किताब का आकार 20MB से ज्यादा है
Turn off touch screen mode: टच स्क्रीन बंद करें (preventing accidentally touch)
Please import less than 10 books: कृपया 10 से कम किताबें आयात करें
Please delete some books before import: कृपया आयात करने से पहले कुछ किताबें मिटाएं
For better user experience, please visit: अच्छे अनुभव के लिए, कृपया इस साइट को कंप्यूटर पर देखें
It seems like you're lost: लगता है आप खो गये हैं
Only desktop support this format: इस प्रारूप को सिर्फ डेस्कटाॅप सपोर्ट करता है
Only desktop support this service: इस सेवा को सिर्फ डेस्कटाॅप सपोर्ट करता है
This action will move this book and its: यह क्रिया किताब और इसके नोट्स, बुकमार्कस और हाईलाइट्स को recycle bin में डाल देगा
This action won't delete the original bo: यह क्रिया वास्तविक किताब को नहीं मिटायेगाी
Do you want to open this link in browser: क्या आप इस लिेक को ब्राउज़र में खोलना चाहते हैं
WebDAV Info: WebDAV एक उपयोग में आसान और कुशल समाधान है, हम NextCloud के द्वारा उपलब्ध WebDAV की सेवा उपयोग करने की सलाह देते हैं
You successfully update to: आप सफलतापूर्ण अपडेट् करने के लिए
This action will remove all the books in: यह क्रिया recycle bin में सभी किताबें हटा देगाी, उनके नोट्स, बुकमार्कस,और संग्रह के साथ
Batch import only support epub or pdf fi: Batch import सिर्फ ePub या pdf फाइल्स ही सपोर्ट करता है
Sync function works with third-party clo: Synchronisation फंक्शन थर्ड-पार्टी क्लाउड स्टोरेज़ के साथ काम करता है। आपको दूसरे कंप्यूटर की स्टोरेज़ लोकेशन समान क्लाउड स्टोरेज़ फोल्डर पर करनी होगी। जब आज sync बटन पर क्लिक करेगें, Koodo Reader स्वत् इस फोल्डर से आपका डाटा डाउनलोड या अपलोड कर लेगा और आपके सभी कंप्यूटर्स पर synchronized रखेगा। अधिक निर्देशों के लिए हमारे दस्तावेज़ देखें।
Please turn off open books in the main w: कृपया पहले मुख्य विंडो में खुली किताबें बंद करें
Please turn off merge with word first: कृपया पहले शब्द के साथ विलय को बंद करें
Data change detected, whether to update?: डेटा परिवर्तन का पता चला।क्या आप अपडेट करना चाहते हैं?
Use the fonts from your local computer: अपने लोकल कंप्यूटर से फ़ॉन्टस् उपयोग करें
Backup your data with WebDAV: WebDAV से अपना डाटा backup करें
Click the import button to add books: किताबें जोड़ने के लिए आयात पर क्लिक करें
Auto Update relies on GitHub Release for: Package hosting के लिए GitHub Release से relies स्वत् अपडेट् करें, अगर आपके पास GitHub के लिए स्थिर इंटरनेट कनेक्शन् नहीं है,हम आपको यह विकल्प बंद रखने की सलाह देगें
Right click on any book and click Add to: किसी भी किताब पर दायां क्लिक करें और पसंदीदा में जोड़े पर क्लिक कर अपनी पसंदीदा किताबों में जोड़ें
Select any text and click the note butto: किसी भी टेक्स्ट को चुनें और पॉप-अप मेन्यू में नोट पर क्लिक करें
Select any text and click the highlight: किसी भी टेक्स्ट को चुनें और पॉप-अप मेन्यू में हाईलाइट् बटन पर क्लिक करें
Move your mouse on top of any book, then: अपने माउस को किसी भी किताब के ऊपर ले जाएं, फिर अधिक आइकन् पर क्लिक कर किताब को अपने शेल्फ पर जोड़ें
Download failed, network problem or no b: डाउनलोड विफल, नेटवर्क समस्या या बैकअप नहीं
Click on any book to read: पढ़ने के लिए किसी भी किताब पर क्लिक करें
Move your mouse on the top edge of the r: अपने माउस को रीडर के ऊपरी किनारे की ओर ले जाएं
Download failed,network problem or no ba: डाउनलोड विफल,नेटवर्क समस्या या बैकअप नहीं
Choose your action to this book: इस किताब के लिए अपनी क्रिया चुनें
What's new about this version: इस वर्ज़न में क्या नया है
When Koodo is running, your computer won: जब Koodo चल रहा हो, आपका कंप्यूटर स्लीप मोड में नहीं जायेगा
Import books as link: किताबें लिंक की करह आयात करें
Close main window while reading: पढ़ते समय मुख्य विंडो बंद करें
Merge reader into Word: रीडर को वर्ड में मर्ज करें
Get rid of window frame, make reader hid: विंडो फ्रेम़ से छुटकारा पायें,रीडर को शब्द या टेक्स्ट एडिटर में छिपाएं, और पता नहीं लगाया जा सकता है. पहले आपको रीडर की स्थिति, आकार और स्टाइल व्यवस्थित करना होगा.
The imported books will not be copied to: आयात की गई किताबें लाइब्रेरी में कॉपी नहीं होंगी, सिर्फ वास्तविक किताब के पाथ से लिंक होंगी
Reader menu will not be triggered by hov: रीडर मेन्यू क्षेत्र पर क्लिक करने के द्वारा होवर नहीं बल्कि ट्रिगर किया जाएगा
Gesture and UI optimization for touch sc: टच स्क्रीन के लिए Gesture और UI optimization
The book that you read from last time wi: किताब जो आप पिछली बार पढ़ रहे थे लॉन्चिंग पर वह स्वत् खुल जायेगी
All the folded content will be expanded: सारा सिमटा कंटेट नेविगेशन पैनल में बढ़ जायेगा
Reader window will be maximized to fit t: किसी किताब को खोलते समय रीडर विंडो अधिकतम हो जायेगी
Book won't be opened in a separate windo: किताब अलग विंडो में नहीं खुलेगीं किन्तु सीधे मुख्य विंडो में खुलेगीं
Open book without adding it to library: किताबें लाइब्रेरी में जोड़े बिना खोलें
When opening books in the file manager w: Koodo से File Manager में किताबें खोलते समय, खोली गईं किताबें लाइब्रेरी में नहीं जुड़ेगीं
Please turn off open books in the main w: कृपया मुख्य विंडो में किताबें बंद करें
This action will delete all the notes, b: यह क्रिया इस किताब के सभी नोट्स, बुकमार्कस और संग्रह को मिटा देगाी
Koodo Reader's web version are limited b: Koodo Reader's का वेब वर्ज़न ब्राउज़र के द्वारा सीमित है, अधिक शक्तिशाली खुबियों के लिए, कृपया डेस्कटाॅप वर्ज़न डाउनलोड करें.
No popup when selecting texts: टेक्स्ट चुनते समय कोई पॉपअप नहीं
Turn it on when you want Koodo to work w: यदि आप चाहते हैं कि Koodo third-party अनुवाद करने वाले Services के साध काम करें, चुनें टेक्स्ट पर बायां क्लिक करने पर पुन् pop-up आयेगा
When deleting books, they will be delete: किताबें हटाते समय ,वे trash में जाने की जगह, सदा के लिए मिट जायेगी
Hide books which have been added to the: जो किताबें शेल्फ में जोड़ी गईं हैं, उन्हें छिपाएं,जिससे वे होमपेज़ पर न दिखें
Delete book from shelf also deleting boo: शेल्फ से किताबें मिटाएं और साथ में किताबें भी मिटाएं
When deleting book from shelf, the book: शेल्फ से किताब हटाते समय , किताब भी साथ में मिट जायेगी
This action will permanently delete the: यह क्रिया चुनीं गई किताबों को सदा के लिए, उनके नोट्स, बुकमार्कस और संग्रह के साथ मिटा देगाी
Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use: SSL का उपयोग करें, 1 करने के लिए, 0 नहीं करने के लिए
Thanks for using the developer version,: डेवलपर वर्ज़न का उपयोग करने के लिए धन्यवाद, अगर आपको परेशानी पड़े कृपया एक comment करें. हम आपको यहां से जवाब नहीं दे पायेगें. जल्दी और बढ़िया मदद के लिए, कृपया यहां जाएं
You're not using the latest version of K: आप Koodo Reader का नवीनतम संस्करण उपयोग नही कर रहे हैं. कृपया पहले अपडेट् करें
Your email(optional), We may contact you: आपकी email(वैकल्पिक), अधिक जानकारी के लिए हम आपसे संपर्क करेगें
Duplicate book in trash bin: Trash bin में किताब डुप्लीकेट करें
Modify the storage location of the libra: लाइब्रेरी का संग्रहण स्थान बदलें, और लाइब्रेरी नए स्थान पर स्थानांतरित हो जाएगी। कृपया सुनिश्चित करें कि नया फ़ोल्डर खाली हो।
Switch between multiple libraries withou: मूल लाइब्रेरी को प्रभावित किए बिना कई लाइब्रेरी के बीच स्विच करें। मुफ़्त संस्करण में मल्टी-डिवाइस सिंक्रोनाइज़ेशन के लिए, कृपया दस्तावेज़ देखें
Overwrite the default link style in the: पुस्तक में डिफ़ॉल्ट लिंक शैली को अधिलेखित करें
Paste the code of the plugin here, check: Paste the code of the plugin here, check out document to learn how to get more plugins
Always keep local data when resolving sy: Always keep local data when resolving sync conflicts
If you update a piece of data that has a: If you update a piece of data that has already been deleted in the cloud before synchronization, it will cause a conflict. In this case, we will keep the cloud data by default. If you turn this option on, we will keep the local data
Meticulously designed and built for Andr: Meticulously designed and built for Android and iOS
After three years of design and developm: After three years of design and development, the mobile version of Koodo Reader is finally out
Synchronize books and reading progress a: Synchronize books and reading progress across all your devices
With the integration of your cloud drive: With the integration of your cloud drive, WebDAV, and object storage, all your data remains securely in your control
Embark on your journey of exploration wi: Embark on your journey of exploration with Koodo Reader Pro
By clicking continue, you acknowledge th: By clicking continue, you acknowledge that you have carefully read and agree to accept Koodo Reader's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Add a data source for data synchronizati: Add a data source for data synchronization and backup
Download the mobile version to read and: Download the mobile version to read and take notes anytime, anywhere
At least one login option should be kept: At least one login option should be kept
Please turn off auto open book in full s: Please turn off auto open book in full screen
Please turn off import books as link fir: Please turn off import books as link first
Default sync option cannot be removed: Default sync option cannot be removed
This feature is not available in the fre: This feature is not available in the free version
Please set default sync option in the se: Please set default sync option in the setting
Please add data source in the setting: Please add data source in the setting
Don't automatically pre-cache books for: Don't automatically pre-cache books for mobile version after import
Upon importing, books will be automatica: Upon importing, books will be automatically pre-cached, enabling seamless access in the mobile version. However, this process may consume additional storage space and extend the import duration. You can still do it manually
Sync state is occupied by other devices,: Sync state is occupied by other devices, please try again later
This feature is only available in the de: This feature is only available in the developer version
PDF files in double page mode does not s: PDF files in double page mode does not support note taking yet
You haven't upgraded to Pro yet: You haven't upgraded to Pro yet
For just the price of a cup of coffee pe: For just the price of a cup of coffee per year, you can continue to enjoy the premium features and support our development
Your data has been exported to your loca: Your data has been exported to your local folder, learn how to sync your data to your other devices by visiting our documentation, Upgrade to pro to get more advanced features
Your data has been imported from your lo: Your data has been imported from your local folder, Upgrade to pro to get more advanced features
Due to Aliyun Drive's stringent concurre: Due to Aliyun Drive's stringent concurrency restrictions, we have bypassed the synchronization of books and covers. Please manually download the books by clicking on them
Aliyun Drive imposes strict limits on co: Aliyun Drive imposes strict limits on concurrent downloads. It is recommended that you wait 10 seconds before attempting to download again.
Some S3 services are not compatible with: Some S3 services are not compatible with browser environments. If you encounter connection issues, please refer to the service provider's official documentation for instructions on enabling CORS. Also due to browser's security restrictions, the S3 service must be accessed via HTTPS protocol when you're visiting Koodo Reader via HTTPS protocol.
Due to the limited number of emails we c: Due to the limited number of emails we can send each day, to prevent login issues after reaching the sending limit, please make sure to add additional login options as backups after logging in.
Failed to send code, error code: Failed to send code, error code
Please click the authorize button below: Please click the authorize button below to authorize your account, enter the obtained credentials here, and then click the bind button below
Please login again to update your member: Please login again to update your membership on this device
Tasks failed after multiple retries, ple: Tasks failed after multiple retries, please check the network connection
The Koodo Reader Docker version does not: The Koodo Reader Docker version does not support the data source feature by default. You need to modify the configuration parameters during deployment to manually enable it. Also due to browser's security restrictions, the Docker service must be accessed via HTTPS protocol when you're visiting Koodo Reader via HTTPS protocol.
Some login options and data sources are: Some login options and data sources are not available in your selected server region
Grant access to local folder to save you: Grant access to local folder to save your data and reduce the risk of data loss
Continue to store in the browser: Continue to store in the browser
Failed to get folder access permission: Failed to get folder access permission
Need to reauthorize the access to direct: Need to reauthorize the access to directory
Granting access to local folder, please: Granting access to local folder, please wait
Please click the allow on every visit bu: Please click the allow on every visit button to avoid this popup once and for all
Only desktop version supports TTS plugin: Only desktop version supports TTS plugin
We have bypassed the synchronization of: We have bypassed the synchronization of book cover for Aliyun Drive, covers will be downloaded automatically when you open the book next time.
What are the key points of this chapter: What are the key points of this chapter
Ask anything about reading or learning: Ask anything about reading or learning
Hi there! I'm happy to help with any que: Hi there! I'm happy to help with any questions about reading or learning
Hi there! What questions do you have abo: Hi there! What questions do you have about this chapter?
Recommend me some books from Colleen Hoo: Recommend me some books from Colleen Hoover
Explain Stoicism and its principles to m: Explain Stoicism and its principles to me
Please add data source in the setting-Sy: Please add data source in the setting-Sync and backup first
Broken data detected, please click the s: Broken data detected, please click the setting button to reset the sync records
Enable this option to increase synchroni: Enable this option to increase synchronization speed. Your reading progress, notes, highlights, bookmarks, and other reading-related data will be stored and synced via our cloud service, your books and covers will still be synced by your added data sources. Turning off this option will remove the above data from our cloud.
Access may be unstable in China: Access may be unstable in China
Only WebDAV service provided by Alist is: Only WebDAV service provided by Alist is directly supported in Browser, Other WebDAV services need to enable CORS to work properly. Also due to browser's security restrictions, the WebDAV service must be accessed via HTTPS protocol when you're visiting Koodo Reader via HTTPS protocol.
By default, Koodo Reader will automatica: By default, Koodo Reader will automatically synchronize your data when you open the app and exit reading
This endpoint usually don't contain buck: This endpoint usually don't contain bucket name
7-days free trial only applies to users: 7-days free trial only applies to users who registered with recommended email providers. Recommended email providers are as follows
In the future, we will introduce more me: In the future, we will introduce more member-exclusive features, including reading statistics and automatic synchronization of your notes, highlights, reading progress, and vocabulary lists to platforms like Notion, Obsidian, Logseq, Anki, and more.
Once you exit the Pro version, you will: Once you exit the Pro version, you will no longer be able to use synchronization and other premium features
When the spacing between two lines of te: When the spacing between two lines of text is n times of regular spacing, they will be split into two paragraphs
After hiding the menu button, you can mo: After hiding the menu button, you can move the mouse to the edge of the window to show it again.
When a line of text is n times the size: When a line of text is n times the size of regular text, it will be treated as a title
Server path (Please first create this fo: Server path (Please first create this folder manually)
Language auto-detection may not be accur: Language auto-detection may not be accurate. Please try selecting the source language manually
Disable auto scroll to next or previous: Disable auto scroll to next or previous chapter
Disable auto scroll to next or previous chapter when reaching the end of the current chapter
To reduce storage usage, only the book m: To reduce storage usage, only the book metadata is downloaded by default, and the book files are not downloaded. After enabling this option, all book files will be downloaded during synchronization
Main window will be maximized to fit the: Main window will be maximized to fit the screen when launching
Your Pro trial has expired, please renew: Your Pro trial has expired, please renew it to continue using the Pro features
This data source cannot be accessed from: This data source cannot be accessed from browser due to CORS policy. Please switch to another data source or CORS-enabled service provider.
This data source cannot be accessed due: This data source cannot be accessed due to browser's security policy. Please switch to another data source or HTTPS-based service provider.
Use file name as book title: Use file name as book title
With the integration of popular cloud st: With the integration of popular cloud storage services, WebDAV, FTP, SFTP, SMB, Docker, and object storage, all your data remains securely in your control
The 115 cloud is only recommended for VI: The 115 cloud is only recommended for VIP users, as it is nearly unusable for free users. Additionally, due to API issues with 115 cloud, synchronization can be very slow. If you insist on using 115 cloud storage for syncing, it is recommended to enable Koodo Sync simultaneously, which will significantly improve the synchronization speed.
Request timed out, You may change the se: Request timed out, You may change the server region to China to solve the connection issue in mainland China. Go to Settings > Account
Please add a data source in Setting-Sync: Please add a data source in Setting-Sync and backup
Failed to read file, please refresh and: Failed to read file, please refresh and grant directory access again
No files found in this folder: No files found in this folder
Please make sure the email and code are: Please make sure the email and code are correct
If you didn't receive the verification c: If you didn't receive the verification code, please check the spam folder or use another email provider
In order to let you directly manage your: In order to let you directly manage your data in Google Drive, we have deprecated the old Google Drive token. Please reauthorize Google Drive in the settings. Your new data will be stored in the root directory of your Google Drive, and you can manage it directly in the Google Drive web interface.
